title: Upgraded 2-bedroom+Den Luxury Apartments **Amenities Galore**
posting_body: ['Resort-style luxury apartments for rent in the south, just minutes from the Strip, shopping, restaurants and freeway access.', '1-bedroom, 2-bedroom and 3-bedroom models available starting in the $1,400s.', 'Choose between 2-bedrooms+Den or Dual master bedroom units.', 'Upgraded wood-flooring, high ceilings, wonderful gourmet kitchen with granite countertops, upgraded cabinets and high-end appliances.', 'Washer/dryer in every unit.', '2-bedroom units have walk-in closets in both bedrooms.', 'Beautiful bathrooms with separate shower and spa-style tubs in master bath.', 'Private balconies with city, mountains views or community/pool views.', 'AMENITIES GALORE - filled with art, design and colorful retro-chic decor.', 'Community pool and spa with cabanas, bar with free mimosas on Sundays and free Wi-fi.', 'Clubhouse with exercise room, weight room and a lounge with kitchenette.', '1-year lease minimum.', 'Pets considered w/deposit.', 'Rent: $1,855/month', 'Security deposit: $1,855 (higher w/bad credit)', 'Pet deposit: $250/pet', 'App.fee: $50/applicant', 'Tel:', 'show contact info', 'For the fastest response, please leave a detailed message - thank you', 'Henderson - Green Valley - Silverado Ranch area leasing specialist', 'American Realty Properties', 'Lic', 'No: 170610', '***Pictures represent the models, units are unfurnished.', 'Furnished units available at additional cost', '1-BED - from $1,765/Mo.', '2-BED+DEN from $1,855/Mo.', '2-BED (DUAL MASTER)  $1,965/Mo.', '3-BED N/A', 'Keyword: South Strip apartments']
